Containers.Name: apache-php
Containers.Description: An apache and PHP image for hosting web applications.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the configuration and library files will reside[br][br] [b]/mags[/b] This is where your magazine library is[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and the config and music folder location. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']3220[/span] is the WebUI port[br]
